Articles.Content:
Anyone else tried launching 1.8 and the main menu buttons don't work at all?

They show the hover/click anims, but don't actually do anything. Obviously this is due to a mod, but I can't figure out which one it is. I would post my mod list, but I'd rather see if others are having this issue first so we can compare mod lists then.
I have found out from testing that it is due to Contract Configurator.
